definition: dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

sentences.english: Reading these same stories mythologically, however, can bring forth their universal qualities.
sentences.chinese: 然而，這些相同的神話故事也展示了他們的普遍特徵。

sentences.english: Mythology adds a richness of detail and a concreteness to metaphorical language.
sentences.chinese: 神話故事增加了大量的細節描述和一個寓意。
小孩貪婪地傾聽神話故事。

sentences.english: What he said sounded like a fairy-tale.
sentences.chinese: 他所說的話聽起來就像神話故事。

sentences.english: It does not draw from real life, it only creates myths.
A nurse’s fairy-tales are accepted as the gospel truth.
sentences.chinese: 保姆的神話故事被當作福音書中的真理而接受。

sentences.english: Old Mrs. Mingott's foreign daughters had become a legend.
sentences.chinese: 老明戈特太太的兩個外籍女兒成了一則神話故事。

sentences.english: MAGIC】In fairy tales witches often use magic to change persons into animals or birds.
sentences.chinese: 在神話故事中，巫婆常使用魔術將人變成動物或鳥。

sentences.english: Legend of the White Snake is one of the most famous tales spreading out among folks in ancient China.
sentences.chinese: 白蛇傳是流傳在古代中國非常著名的一個神話故事。

sentences.english: The teacher regaled the children with some fairy tales.
sentences.chinese: 老師講了些神話故事，孩子們聽得津津有味。

sentences.english: The legend Chang Er Flying to the Moon is a beautiful fable of ancient China.
sentences.chinese: 嫦娥奔月的傳說是中國古代一個美麗的神話故事。

sentences.english: In Chapter Two, regenerationout of death is strongly implied through the religious and mythical stories embedded in the poem.
sentences.chinese: 第二章從詩歌貫穿始終的宗教和神話故事角度分析。

sentences.english: He depicted traditional Chinese folk tales or historical stories to hint obliquely at contemporary realist themes.
sentences.chinese: 都是以歷史或神話故事影射現實的主題性創作。

sentences.english: Then put it like fairy tales, one angel, one demon.
sentences.chinese: 那麼就像神話故事中所言，一是天使，一是魔鬼。

definition: hard to distinguish real from imitation
variant of 圖像|图像[tu2 xiang4]
lit. you hoodwink me and I cheat you (idiom); fig. mutual deception/each tries to outwit the other/dog eats dog and devil take the hindmost
tone sandhi/modified tone/(music) to change key/modulation
hard to tell if it's real or sham
